channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The drain is located at the end of Albert Street, in the corner of the road, just before the bollards., 8th June
item.description:
The drain overflows when it rains heavily. The puddle extends all the way to the start of the dropped kerb (i.e. the start of the driveway) at 2-4 Albert Street. The puddle has been spotted a few times over the last couple of months when there has been heavy rain. However, last night (7th June 2025) the puddle was very big due to the sudden heavy rain fall. There is concern that next time it rains heavily the puddle could grow larger and spill over the pavement/driveway and into front doors of 2-4 and 6 Albert Street (as they are below the road surface).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Albert Street, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox, 8th June
item.description:
There was a dead fox on the road and cars couldn’t pass through. We put the fox in a bin bag and removed it from the road so the cars can keep going and we’ve left it near the bus stop where the bin is on the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crayford Way, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Main Gate, 8th June
item.description:
For well over a year the lock of the main gate has been broken. This has made it easier for theft and abandoned vehicles including damage to residents vehicles. Residents were told this was due to procurement of a new supplier.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapledene Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree over grown and fallen branch, 8th June
item.description:
The tree outside 194 clock house road has a fallen branch that is dangling into the pavement. The tree is also generally very overgrown and hanging over the front garden of 194. It’s covering and crushing the yukka tree in our front garden.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clock House Road, Elmers End, London

item.category: Road drain/gully cover - missing or damaged

item.title: There is a Thames Water manhole cover in the middle of the road outside 19-21 Goodmead Road. This is banging every time a car goes over it. Very noisy and keeps the elderly residents awake at night time. Please can this be looked into as soon as possible?, 8th June
item.description:
There is a Thames Water manhole cover in the middle of the road outside 19-21 Goodmead Road. This is banging every time a car goes over it. Very noisy and keeps the elderly residents awake at night time. Please can this be looked into as soon as possible?

item.title: Blocked drain next to bus stop. It was missed previously and not unblocked., 8th June
item.description:
Blocked drain next to bus stop for over 4 months. I reported this previously. A contractor did unblock some drains down the road, but missed this one. It's a flooding risk down this road. Please can this be cleared. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Park, Crystal Palace, London
